title: Veg Veg Emporio Vegetariano
description: Little vegetarian store opened Jan 2013. Stocks all-vegan products from frozen meals and packaged snacks to tofutti and cupcakes. Also has a vegan food counter twenty steps away in the general food court. The counter features vegan versions of Brazilian street food such as kibe and pao de queijo. Also offers burgers, sweet and savory crepes and a variety of desserts.
